snippet: A jury found two Georgia men guilty on Friday of plotting to make the poison ricin in what prosecutors described as a plan to target federal government officials....

headline.print_headline: Jury Finds 2 Georgia Men Guilty in Ricin Plot
headline.main: Jury Finds 2 Georgia Men Guilty in Ricin Plot

lead_paragraph: A jury found two Georgia men guilty on Friday of plotting to make the poison ricin in what prosecutors described as a plan to target federal government officials.
